ISSUE.TITLE: Add 'parent setting' interface to the Forum settings page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to the Forum settings page 2. Look at the Feeds panel: - Don't show the 'Forum feed count' setting if the 'Forum feeds enabled' is not ticked. - Don't show the 'Active discussions feed count' setting if the 'Active discussions feed enabled' is not ticked.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4937 Fixed the "Upload" field displaying on the "Return item(s) from order" page

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4941 Added 'parent setting' interface to the Forum settings page
